programme.title: Hello, Dolly!
programme.desc: A matchmaker named Dolly Levi takes a trip to Yonkers, New York to see the "Well-Known unmarried Half-A-Millionaire," Horace Vandergelder. While there, she convinces him, his two stock clerks and his niece and her beau to go to New York City. In New York, she fixes Vandergelder's clerks up with the woman Vandergelder had been courting, and her shop assistant (Dolly has designs of her own on Mr. Vandergelder, you see).(n)

programme.title: No Matter What
programme.desc: This drama provides laughter and emotions with humorous characters in an extended family whose boundaries have widened through divorce and remarriage.(n)

programme.title: Man In A Veil
programme.desc: A man has the intelligence of a seven-year-old due to an accident. One day, he meets with a miraculous situation on the edge of his life. After that, he dream about revenge for something.(n)

programme.desc: Joo Hongbin is capable, rich and good-looking, but he is so ill-tempered! One day, this supercilious guy turns into a monster. When he is angry, blades spring out from his body. programme.title: Dogs Are Incredible
programme.desc: Korea's "Comedy King" Lee Gyenggyu who's also known for his love for dogs, along with the country's most famous dog expert Kang Hyungwook, team up to study how humans and pets live in peace and harmony.(n)

programme.title: Driving Miss Wealthy

programme.title: Burning

Many women feel turning 30 years old is a big step in their lives. The ageing issue not just affects them in feeling tired and experiencing loss of energy, but also drives them to feel sad.(n)

programme.title: From Beijing With Love

programme.desc: On a winter day, when a tiger escapes from the zoo, a man is kicked out of his girlfriend's house. Having no place to go, he wanders around while working as a substitute driver and meets his old girlfriend.(n)

programme.title: Shanghai Grand

programme.title: Kung Fu Mahjong

To prepare for the final leg of the competition, Shi Shen throws himself into practice, neglecting Xiao Yu.(n)

programme.title: Lucky Boy

programme.title: The Gangs, The Oscars, And The Walking Dead
programme.desc: Director Wenxi and producer BS are two friends trying to make a zombie movie. With insufficient money, they join a local gang to make some extra cash. One day, their big boss Brother Long decides to invest in the movie project.(n)

programme.title: Fat Choi Spirit
programme.desc: This comedy centres around a mahjong master, Andy, and his dealings with his ex-girlfriend, estranged family and a local gang.(n)

programme.title: The Wrath

programme.title: Demi Haunted

programme.title: A Fool In Love, Love Like A Fool
programme.desc: Xiao-wei enjoys reading picture books written by his favourite author Kauff. One day he meets Blue, a mermaid. Since then, Xiao-wei's 'normal life' becomes not so 'normal'.(n)

programme.title: Stained Ep. 2

programme.title: Twenty

programme.title: Profiles Of Pleasure

programme.title: Pom Pom

programme.title: An Autumn's Tale
programme.desc: This story deals with two people from different social backgrounds who begin the unlikeliest of romances in a land far from home.(n)

programme.title: Fearless Hyena II
programme.desc: Jackie Chan hides in the mountains to avoid his enemies.(n)

programme.title: Burning Sensation

programme.desc: Yiu is sentenced to three years for manslaughter, while Ching was sent to prison for killing his wife over her being a prostitute. The inmates decide to go on hunger strike to protest against a cigarette price rise, and this causes problems with "Assassin".(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: Bat Po stops biting people thanks to Siu Ling. Planted by Shengmu, the peach tree is in charge of punishments in man's world. Mo Lui sends Ngan Ping into Bat Po's world in order to end his life.(n)

programme.desc: A mysterious and highly-skilled hitwoman in Hong Kong is paid to assassinate top-level crime bosses. After striking up a relationship, she decides to travel to South Korea to complete one last job.(n)

programme.title: The Last Message
programme.desc: Tim and Lee are employees of a mental hospital working as an orderly and nurse respectively. One day a crazy man named Cheng Ming, who carries a bag of trash, is institutionalised. Tim and Lee discover that the bag is full of artifacts from the Ming Dynasty.(n)

programme.title: Faces Of Horror
programme.desc: Four youngsters return to the house that claimed their friend's life to confront the demon. A single mother and her daughter live with a curse and a wandering ghost searching for her living lover.(n)

programme.title: The Lost Souls
programme.desc: The Ling family are hoping to migrate to Canada, but they all die in a gas-poisoning accident. It turns out migrating in the next life takes money, too. In order to raise funds to head west, the Lings return to the mortal world and get to work.(n)

programme.title: Wu Yen
programme.desc: Wu Yen stars Anita Mui as Emperor Qi, the male ruler of an ancient kingdom overrun by warring tribes. Qi is set to marry the warrior-heroine Wu Yen when a mischievous, bisexual sorceress known as Yin Chun falls in love with both of them and begins meddling in their affairs.(n)

programme.title: Heart Against Hearts
programme.desc: George Lam and Carol Cheng play a couple who finally settle down after a long-running love marathon. Their troubles begin when George loses his job and becomes a house-husband, while Carol and daughter (Vivian Chow) become the breadwinners of the family.(n)

programme.title: Royal Warriors
programme.desc: Policewoman Michelle Yeoh goes after revenge-seeking villains with the help of Michael Wong and Japanese agent Henry Sanada.(n)

programme.title: A Chinese Ghost Story III
programme.desc: Bai Yun and his disciple Fong journey through a small town to transport a golden idol of Buddha. However, thieves thwart their journey, sending them to take shelter at the ghostly Orchid Temple. There, Fong encounters Lotus, a female ghost at the evil bidding of the awakened Tree Devil.(n)

programme.title: The Magnificent Scoundrels
programme.desc: Valentino is a mediocre con-artist who crosses paths with Kwan, a fellow con-artist. Together, they impersonate various people and create numerous schemes to make money. Meanwhile, gangsters are making a scheme of their own.(n)

programme.title: Unfaithfully Yours
programme.desc: A comedy about a cheating husband on a trip to Japan who is tailed by a tabloid. All hell breaks loose when the wife shows up as well.(n)

programme.title: A True Mob Story ()
programme.desc: Triad member Cheung Dee earns his living as a parking attendant. Fending off an ambush by a rival gang leader, Cheung Dee blinds the leader of the gang, Crazy Ball.(n)

programme.title: City Hunter
programme.desc: A self-indulgent private investigator winds up on a cruise ship full of rich patrons, gorgeous women, murderous terrorists and scarce food.(n)

programme.title: Paper Marriage
programme.desc: An illegal immigrant with no Green Card is subject to humiliation, and does odd things to survive - like false marriage.(n)

programme.title: Flaming Brothers
programme.desc: Alan and Tien have formed a bond since childhood that will last a lifetime. Later, they progress from pickpockets to gangsters running a successful nightclub business, but their refusal to get involved in drug trafficking incurrs the wrath of local crime boss Kao.(n)

programme.title: Cause We Are So Young
programme.desc: Paul, Chuen and Choi are three young guys who share an apartment and an assortment of girl troubles that challenges their maturity.(n)

programme.title: City Hero
programme.desc: Mark and Anthony are policemen who want to become members of the special squad.(n)

programme.title: The Intellectual Trio
programme.desc: Wong Kar-wai co-scripted this comedy about cops Leslie Cheung and Billy Lau who encounter pickpockets Sandy Lam and Joyce Ngai.(n)

programme.title: Vampire Vs. Vampire
programme.desc: Lam Ching Ying discovers that the water supply in his village has been contaminated by bats and, while in the process of digging a well to find new water supply, he inadvertently unearths the corpse of an evil priest.(n)

programme.title: Love Unto Wastes
programme.desc: Chow is assigned to investigate a murder case. He discovers the complicated relationship among four suspects.(n)

programme.title: The Attractive One
programme.desc: Sean Lau plays a barbeque restaurant owner who falls in love with Joey Yung, a beauty thearpist in a pet beauty shop. As fate would have it, Joey has a crush on someone else. Can a 30-odd-year-old who has never experienced love win the love of his life? Or are his efforts doomed to failure?(n)

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of cops get brutally exposed to violence after raiding a drug operation and discovering a link between a few members of the police force and an American crime syndicate dealing with drug trafficking.(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Friends
programme.desc: In order to save her father's television station, Elizabeth asks four funny witty guys for help, but the situation gets worse under their guide.(n)

programme.title: Teaching Sucks
programme.desc: Anthony Wong and Jan Lamb are unenthusiastic teachers, until new colleague Cathy Tsui rekindles their interest in school and life.(n)

programme.title: No Compromise
programme.desc: Tackling serious crime is Danny Lee's routine job, and his wife DoDo Cheng always worries about his safety. Cheng forces Lee to choose between abandonment of job and divorce. On the other hand, Lee racks his brains over pursuing the robbery couple, Lam Wai and Pauline Wong.(n)

programme.title: Born Wild
programme.desc: Tide immerses himself in Hong Kong's seedy underground boxing culture after the death of his fraternal twin brother Tan. Tide unexpectedly discovers that Tan led a wild life, full of violence and passionate emotions, and that his death shattered more than a few people.(n)

programme.title: Funny Triple
programme.desc: Funnymen Eric Tsang and Anthony Chan play CIDs Woodpecker and Gold Finger. They are assigned to nail the nefarious gang boss Brother Shing. Unfortunately, cracks begin to show in their friendship one day when beautiful policewoman Gigi joins their team.(n)

programme.title: Eastern Condors
programme.desc: Lam is an American army officer given a top-secret mission by the US military. Due to the dangerous nature of the mission, a group of Chinese American soldier convicts are selected to accompany him, led by Tung Ming-sun.(n)

programme.title: Spooky Encounters
programme.desc: Villager Bold Cheung, known for his willingness to do anything courageous or daring, becomes a target by the evil rich Master Tam who wants to keep Cheung's wife as his mistress. Cheung is tricked into a bet to spend the night in a haunted temple.(n)

programme.title: Millionaires Express
programme.desc: The No. 1 comedy hit of 1986 has kung-fu master Sammo Hung involved with officials, concubines, merchants and conmen in old China.(n)

programme.title: The Inspector Wears Skirts II
programme.desc: Police Academy meets Private Benjamin when the all-girl Banshees compete with the all-boy Flying Tigers to nab a criminal gang.(n)

programme.title: Queen's Bench III
programme.desc: Bumbling lawyer Alfred Cheung is assigned to a sensational murder case involving Tony Leung and Carina Lau, with farcical results.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire Saga 4
programme.desc: In the rural countryside, a bespectacled Taoist priest called Four-eyed Taoist is always at odds with his neighbour, a Buddhist monk called Master Yat-yau. However their respective students, Kar-lok and Ching-ching, are friendly towards each other.(n)

programme.title: Final Victory
programme.desc: Triad leader Big Bo is a violent man, but his younger brother Hung is a nice guy who fusses around him. Bo commits a crime and is sentenced to prison for six months. Before going to prison, Bo entrusts Hung to take care of his two lovers Ping and Mimi.(n)

programme.title: Three Against The World
programme.desc: Detective Andy Lau must protect a priceless copy of the Koran against the schemes of gunman Norman Tsui Siu-keung and thief Teddy Robin.(n)

programme.title: Running On Karma
programme.desc: A former Buddhist monk returns to the ordinary world to track down the killers of his friend. He soon makes acquaintance with charming policewoman Li Feng Yi who arrests him for a strip performance in front of a public audience.(n)

programme.title: Aces Go Places IV
programme.desc: A nefarious international cartel is after a super soldier formula, the secret of which may lie with King Kong. Meanwhile, Kodojak is still experiencing domestic weirdness with wife "Hot Tongue" Ho and son Baldy Jr.(n)

programme.title: From Riches To Rags
programme.desc: Ricky and Fatso become millionaires overnight after buying a winning lottery ticket. During one of their swinging nights in town, Ricky is suddenly attacked by an upset stomach; in no time, a quack doctor diagnoses the seizure as terminal cancer.(n)

programme.title: Mr. Vampire
programme.desc: A classic Hong Kong vampire comedy about Taoist priests who inadvertently turn a corpse into a murderous zombie. The planned reburial of a village elder goes awry as the corpse resurrects into a hopping, bloodthirsty vampire, threatening mankind.(n)

programme.title: Happy Bigamist
programme.desc: Ah Sun's ex-wife Kong loses her last cent in business, and after going bankrupt is left without a place to stay. As she is entitled to own half of Ah Sun's house, she moves back. Ching, Sun's girlfriend, is determined to show who's the mistress.(n)

programme.title: Royal Tramp
programme.desc: Wai Siu Bo is a lecherous wimp, who after saving Chan, the leader of the Heaven and Earth society, is made a member. After a botched first assignment for the group, he is made a servant to the Emperor, the very person the Heaven and Earth society wants to overthrow.(n)

programme.title: My Date With A Vampire
programme.desc: According to Tin Yat's calculation, Bat Po is General Jinguo during the Song dynasty, and Siu Ling is dead in Zhuxian Town. Bat Po successfully exterminates the vampires and saves Siu Ling with guidance from Yat.(n)

programme.title: Wonder Women ()
programme.desc: A feminist comedy with buxom-but-ditzy Dodo Cheng and twiggy-but-intelligent Cecelia Yip as contestants in a beauty pageant.(n)

programme.title: The Conman
programme.desc: Previously imprisoned for an accidental killing, King returns to the world with his gambling skills intact, but his spirit gone. Help comes in the form of Skinny Dragon and his sexy sister Ching, who initially can't stand King, but eventually starts to warm to his undeniable charm.(n)

programme.title: Marry A Rich Man
programme.desc: Me, a delivery girl, declares to the heavens that she must marry a rich man. On a flight to Milan, Me meets Christmas, a cute, rich Hong Kong resident who immediately takes a shine to Me. She thinks she's hit the jackpot, but as soon as they land the two are pick-pocketed.(n)

programme.title: Project A II
programme.desc: Dragon Ma is assigned to a corrupt police precinct, and brings a squad of righteous officers with him to clean up the territory. But the influence of corrupt Superintendent Chun runs deep, and some of the pirates who threatened Ma in Project A are back looking for revenge.(n)

programme.title: The Private Eyes
programme.desc: A small detective agency has problems staying in business, and out of trouble.(n)

programme.title: Till We Meet Again
programme.desc: In World War II Shanghai, Tony Leung is torn between his duty to China and his love for nightclub singer Anita Mui.(n)

programme.title: Warriors Two
programme.desc: Hua stumbles upon a plot hatched by a businessman named Mo to take over the city of Fushan by killing its headman.(n)

programme.title: City Squeeze
programme.desc: Wong is a supervisor at Yau's firm, and is often taken advantage of because of his integrity and timidity. One day, Yau is stunned by a receptionist, Fung. Most of the male staff in the firm are also interested in Fung, including Wong. But Wong doesn't have the courage to approach her.(n)

programme.title: The Diary Of A Big Man
programme.desc: Chow Ting-Fat loves two women equally and cannot say no to either as both bring the proposal of marriage to him. Number one is Joey Wong, a boutique owner. Number two is Sally Yeh, a stewardess.(n)

programme.title: Those Merry Souls
programme.desc: This supernatural kung-fu comedy stars Yuen Biao as a stuntman who reluctantly takes up the family profession: a collector of dead souls.(n)

programme.title: Chase A Fortune
programme.desc: Sports reporter Xiang is hurted by the King Boxer while trying to interview him. With advice from his cousin, Xiang pretends to be handicapped in order to get compensation from the insurance company.(n)

programme.title: Operation Scorpio
programme.desc: This film is a unique combination of Drunken Master, Sanshiro Sugata and Karate Kid with ingenuity and creative moves you have never seen before!(n)

programme.title: Himalaya Singh
programme.desc: Singh is born and raised in the Himalayas. A naive yoga master, he is ordered by his parents to join a competition hosted by the King of Yoga to fight for the king's daughter. On his way, Singh meets Tally, who falls for him.(n)

programme.title: Restaurant On Wheels: China
programme.desc: Korean star chef Lee Yeon-bok is opening a food truck with Kim Kang-woo, Seo Eun-soo and Heo Kyung-hwan in China, selling Korean-style Chinese cuisine! Will their dishes suit the locals' appetite?(n)

programme.title: The Sixth Sense
programme.desc: Yoo Jae-suk and four female hosts go to find the hottest places or people. However, among the places or people, there are fake ones, and the hosts need to use their 'sixth sense' to identify the fake.(n)

programme.title: 100 Days My Prince
programme.desc: Prince Lee Yul falls off a cliff and nearly dies in an assassination attempt. Having lost his memory, he wanders for 100 days under a new identity. He then meets Hong Sim, head of a detective agency in Joseon.(n)

programme.title: Tale Of The Nine Tailed
programme.desc: A romance fantasy drama that tells the story of a fearless producer determined to hunt down a nine-tailed fox who goes after evils that disrupt the order of the human world.(n)
